job_tasks.phrase: Build Scalable Systems - Design, develop, and maintain high-quality Java applications and services that go beyond client expectations and set new industry benchmarks.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activities of designing, developing, and maintaining software applications and services.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with Modern Architectures - Develop microservices and RESTful APIs using frameworks like Spring, ensuring robust and efficient systems that drive real business impact.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'drive real business impact' indicates a focus on connecting technical work to business outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with Modern Architectures - Develop microservices and RESTful APIs using frameworks like Spring, ensuring robust and efficient systems that drive real business impact.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of specific software architectural patterns like microservices and APIs.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimize & Enhance - Continuously improve existing systems, refactoring and optimizing for performance while following modern development best practices.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to improving and refining existing software systems, a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Shape the Future - Participate in architectural discussions, designing future-proof solutions that keep our clients at the forefront of the industry.
job_tasks.justification: Designing solutions and participating in architectural discussions are key aspects of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Engage with Clients - Partner directly with clients to understand their needs, offer expert technical guidance, and deliver meaningful, results-driven solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Understanding client needs and delivering results-driven solutions directly relates to business context and alignment.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate & Innovate - Work closely with cross-functional teams to craft cutting-edge solutions that prioritize performance, scalability, and long-term maintainability.
Optimize & Enhance - Continuously improve existing systems, refactoring and optimizing for performance while following modern development best practices.
Engage with Clients - Partner directly with clients to understand their needs, offer expert technical guidance, and deliver meaningful, results-driven solutions.
Share & Grow - Contribute to technical documentation, mentor teammates, and help drive a culture of continuous learning and innovation.
Share & Grow - Contribute to technical documentation, mentor teammates, and help drive a culture of continuous learning and innovation.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software development tasks and technologies like Java and Spring. There is no mention of generative AI models, LLMs, or related frameworks, making it unsuitable for the GenAI Engineer profile.
